description:
The Straw Hats prepare to depart Fish-Man Island, a lion and a caribou come to blows over booby-trapped treasure, and Vice Admiral Smoker makes his presence felt in the New World!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Many Problems Lie Ahead! A Trap Awaiting in the New World!
Un chemin parsemé d’embûches. Les pièges du Nouveau Monde
Zento Tanan: Shin Sekai ni Machiukeru Wana
Мрачное будущее! Грядущие неприятности в новом мире!
前途多難 新世界に待ち受ける罠
